message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product. Given the uncertainty about its value to you, I suggest considering the positive feedback from our previous customers and the reliability of our products. Trust in our commitment to quality, and make a decision that aligns with your needs and budget. Remember, this is a one-time offer at a fixed price of $10000.

I'll take the product, but I'm only doing so because I'm the first buyer and I don't have any information to go on. I'm hoping for a high-quality product, but I'm aware that there's a 50% chance it could be low quality. I'm making an informed decision with the information I have, but I'm also aware that my decision may not be optimal.

As you're aware, we've had a high-quality product in the last round, and while there's always a 50% chance of getting either quality, our track record suggests reliability. We hope you find the product valuable and meet your expectations.
